page.title: 13Health
page.content: In Bannvale Special Care Hospital there are about 45 people employed. They do the cleaning, driving and nursing. There are about 45 mentally retarded men. The handicapped men do not have a room to themselves but they have dormitories and they each have their personalized clothing. There is plenty of recreation equipment for the mentally retarded such as rowing machines, exercise bicycles, bowls, snooker tables, pool tables, table tennis, music centres, footballs and swings. The staff take the patients on holidays to such places as Portrush, Isle of Man and Blackpool. Some of the boys go home for the weekend when their parents come. Some of the boys were involved in the Special Olympics in America in 1984 where they were successful in bringing home some gold, silver and bronze medals.
